examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: All of my designs and brand kit are GONE!  No number to call.  I need  help ASAP (410) <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We are having the same issue with the brand kit again.

What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: doubt, in my subscription with more people, our intention is to be able to have each one their brand kit, this is not possible in the way we have done it? or should everyone have a PRO account for that?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Is it possible to have multiple branding kits?  We have several departments that each have their own look and feel

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: When downgrading from Pro to free account, what will happen with my brand kit? And folders?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Using Brand Kit

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: All of my designs/brand kit information are gone. Additionally, it is not showing me as a Pro account user.
What do you need help with ?: Hello! I would like to know if I have access to the brands kit? My plan is pro and I can't handle it. I await contact

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cannot find the brand kit in Canva Enterprise, please can you direct me to it? I used to have no problem finding it when I used Canva pro.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: not able to use brand kit but I have a pro account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: How do I set up more than one brand kit in my Canva Pro? Thanks
Describe the issue: I have a question regarding upgrading my business plan.   Can I manage several different brand kits for several different companies separately

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I have doubts and haven't found anything about. I have a team of 3 people. but I need to have my own brand kit and another one for the team. how do I do that?
What do you need help with?: Why can't I see any assets or brand kits from the teams I have been added to?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am a Pro User of Canva. Suddenly, I am unable to see any of my designs. I had invited one of my team members yesterday.

My brand Kit and uploads are also all missing. Please help

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, something's going on with my account.  It's like it's not acknowledging that I have a paid account. My brand kit is gone, as are all of my designs.  Please help!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I wanted to know with the current Promo buy one, share with 4 others. Do they each get to create their own Brand Kit or is there only one on the Main purchasing account? Does my work stay private from theirs? Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Brand kit , colour , logo

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Our Brand Kit has been removed from our account. Could it be restored?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, 

I have a yearly subscription that renewed on Jan <NUMBER>. 

I can not access my brand kit or anything I had saved in my account. I use this for my business and itâ€™s quite imperative that everythis is restored. 

Thanks, 

<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Im trying to add a second brand kit section and cant figure it out
